lender.occupational_info: I am a grad student at Michigan State University, studying Agriculture, Food, and Resource Economics for International Agricultural Development. I hope to work overseas very soon on development projects.

lender.name: Jeroen & Madeleine

lender.name: Howlips
lender.loan_because: we believe in investing directly in real, hard work done by real people.
lender.occupational_info: As a family, our job is to work everyday, in small ways, to make our community better. As individuals, our jobs are to work everyday to make ourselves better people.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I was a Missionary. I've lived in many of the places I now lend to. Nothing can replace the impact of the Word of God in a person's life. Kiva offers an extra edge in making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: EMT stands for Emergency Medical Technician. I work in an ambulance and help people who need medical attention.

lender.name: bernard
lender.loan_because: jesus said that if we give someone a cup of water in His name we have done it for Him
lender.occupational_info: I sell swimming pools

lender.name: Luis and Marias Mom
lender.loan_because: Because i think everyone should have equal chances to survive in this world.

lender.name: tinatina
lender.loan_because: i want others to obtain & share the prosperity that i've received. hoping it's contagious.
lender.occupational_info: i'm in media and communications, sometimes for profit, sometimes for good. hoping to make it all for good someday.

lender.name: L J
lender.loan_because: I can, and because everyone needs help from time to time.

lender.name: Dina
lender.loan_because: Blessed by God with good health, great family, and the luck to be born in America. I would like to share some of what He has given so freely. I believe that they best way to help people is to enable them to help themselves. I would like everyone in the world to have the opportunity to work hard and have a successful and happy life.
lender.occupational_info: I write software for inventory control systems.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: There are so many deserving people. I want to lend a hand in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: I work on environmental and public heath issues.

lender.name: Kayla
lender.loan_because: Jesus Christ has changed my life and given me a passion to love others.

lender.name: Jake
lender.loan_because: I lived and worked in Malawi, Africa as a Peace Corps volunteer and understand the struggles and need for a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I identify potential pest threats on plants imported and exported out of Florida

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Even though I was born and raised in the U.S.A., I came from a situation similar to those faced by the borrowers. I know what it's like to want to get ahead and have no options or opportunities to do so. I have been fortunate in my life to get where I am today. It was with hard work, good timing and the help of others. I hope to be able to help others do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I work for CBS Outdoor, Inc. A company owned by CBS. Our company is an advertising/media company and I handle real estate leases in a large territory. Our main form of advertising is billboards.

lender.name: Angelo
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage empowerment to people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: we create fun, interactive programs that educate children and adults on smart money management skills.

lender.name: Andrej & Barbara
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Cara & John in Portland
lender.loan_because: Because it makes us feel good to help those that are less fortunate than ourselves (wow, could that be a more generic answer?)
lender.occupational_info: She works on getting the ideas from her head to a computer screen. He, well, actually, he does the same thing!

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: As a musician I know how hard it can be to consolidate funds with an uncertain income stream
lender.occupational_info: I am lucky to have been blessed with the ability to make music for people

lender.name: Tomas Boding
lender.loan_because: I think it´s a brilliant idea!

lender.name: Paul & Beverly

lender.occupational_info: Paul helps his company employ great people and keep them satisfied and productive. Beverly helps her company obey the laws and regulations of the countries where it does business.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: it is the least I can do to help those less fortunate who are striving to make a difference for themselves, their family and their community.

lender.name: Thom
lender.loan_because: This is just the kind of help I like to give, helping people to help themselves.

lender.name: Emily

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: Because by doing so, I can help someone succeed in life. I mention Kiva in my training sessions — I think it's only right to actually DO what I talk about!
lender.occupational_info: I write English language text books for teenagers. I am also involved in teacher training.

lender.loan_because: Because I care!
lender.occupational_info: I work on the internet full time selling advertising and products to other Internet Business's

lender.name: RIS ES Values (5.3)
lender.loan_because: We Grade 5-3 loan because we want to show the people in need that we care, and they could use the money to improve their lives. We are very happy and proud to loan money to different places in the world.
lender.occupational_info: As a teacher, I help students connect with others in the community who are part of the global family. With this, students experienced that when someone gives and does something for others he/she will be blessed in some ways.

lender.name: Erickson Family
lender.loan_because: Life can be summarized by this.. 1) Love God 2) Love your neighbor

lender.name: Corban
lender.loan_because: Seeing someone's business grow from my loan is worth more than the pennies a bank would give me on interest.
lender.occupational_info: I work at an energy company as a programmer

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: this has got to be one of the best ways to help individuals around the world. I especially want to help those in countries t where the US has a military presence.
lender.occupational_info: I teach adults students at a college for students who don't usually get to go to college

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I think we are called to create something wonderful in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I publish children's books through a small independent press.

lender.name: Bishop Machebeuf H.S.
lender.loan_because: In the spirit of Pope Paul VI's declaration in the encyclical Populorum Progressio (On the Development of Peoples), we loan because "development is the new name for peace." As Pope Paul VI said, "To wage war on misery and to struggle against injustice is to promote, along with improved conditions, the human and spiritual progress of all men, and therefore the common good of humanity"
lender.occupational_info: We are high school students at a Catholic high school in Denver, CO.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do and so empowering seeing others create a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I make software for a large electrical utility.

lender.name: Joni
lender.loan_because: This was a birthday gift given to me to be able to help someone in the Pilippines make a better life for themselves I Joni, Cecil's widow, am inspired by the Kiva program and the letter just received. Sadly, my husband passed away on 17 Feb 2011, but I am carrying on the tradition and I would really love to know how to get Kiva into the Island of Or Mindoro, a place where we have friends in Calapan, Victoria and Pinamalayan to name a few as we spent 18 months on that Island 21 years ago and would like to help our friends succeed there as well. How can this be possible? Joni
lender.occupational_info: I worked most of my life on a farm, first my fathers farm and then my own and now we own less than an acre of land with a nice duplex house with our son and daughter-in-law and three teenage sons upstairs, and a very large vegetable garden. we want to promote people being able to grow their own gardens.

lender.name: Kenley
lender.loan_because: I believe micro-finance is one of the best ways to trigger sustainable development.

lender.name: Jocelyn
lender.occupation: Director of Admissions ~ Massage Therapy School

lender.name: Kevin and Serena
lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves. We want to empower women and with Kiva we feel like we can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Kevin manages at Co-op, and Serena is a stay at home mom.

lender.name: Dino
lender.loan_because: It is a blessing to be able to help someone even a little bit. One World - One Love.

lender.name: jimmy
lender.occupational_info: People are getting overwhelmed by information nowadays. The convergence of technology yields more complex structures and inventions. It is extrememly important for users to adapt to these challenges. The ability to filter data stream and elicit core information is quite essential. File search engines let the users experience advanced search while looking for their files. They analyze the informaiton and provide only relevant file downloads for people.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the chance to have their purpose and potential realized.

lender.name: Zack
lender.loan_because: I've seen first hand the positive impact of a modest helping hand.

lender.occupational_info: Pay it forward

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the endeavors of various entrepreneurs around the world that are creating a life following their passions and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I create and perfrom cirque style event entertainment that inspires others to live a life filled with beauty and magic

lender.loan_because: I have a copier business and would like to expand due to the demand in our town..Please help me expand, your help will be greatly appreciated.
lender.occupational_info: My business greatly helps impoverish students near our area since our prices are lower than the other copiers.This way I can help our community and other people as well esp. the students.I am asking your generous heart for our endeavour.God bless.

lender.loan_because: I believe everybody who wants it and works for it deserves a chance of having a decent and honest life.

lender.occupational_info: i fix computers and things :)

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: humanity is 6-billion-person community that is short on solidarity. Kiva is a great way to change that!
lender.occupational_info: I work to educate American students about global issues and communication.

lender.name: Yiling
lender.loan_because:
I believe microfinancing is a fantastic way of helping people break out of the poverty cycle. If a person has the initiative and the will to develop a new business idea or further develop what they've already started, money should not be the only thing tying them down. I think they should go for it and pursue their dreams.
Once a person has a steady income stream, they will feel much more empowered and confident. It will lead to many positive things, including the ability to build their family a solid foundation.
Microfinancing is great because it's not a hand-out as the borrower is obligated to repay the loan. Hence it is a very sustainable way to help others to help themselves.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I would love to give someone the ability to fulfill their dream of owning their own business.
lender.occupational_info: office manager. I work with about 200 other employees offering support and service to our business' customers.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: Little efforts can make a big difference. This is why I support KIVA in its effort to "make this world a better place".
lender.occupational_info: Relocation, integration, cross-cultures

lender.name: William & Melissa Oller
lender.loan_because: I think it is good to give back both to the country that has given me so much and also to the people who simply cannot help themselves without a little help.

lender.name: Pierpaolo
lender.loan_because: this is a GREAT idea!

lender.name: Ukeme
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and their families achieve financial security, and help in a small way to improve communities around the world. I'm also using this opportunity to learn about microfinance.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: There is a need.
lender.occupational_info: Business Owner

lender.name: Elisabeth
lender.loan_because: I feel everyone everywhere should have a chance to build up a life for themselves and their children. By giving loans to small entrepreneurs you let them keep their pride. Charity is OK in days of disaster, but after that people need to stand on their own two feet.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a journalist for more than 35 years. Now due to health reasons I am semi-retired.

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: Because everyone needs a helping hand at some point.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: at this moment, I am able and one day I hope that my children might benefit from the kindness and goodness that this program is offering. Paying it forward is one way to better the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with hospitals across the U.S. to assist them with providing their patients a reliable and economical means of Nurse Call necessities.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: Geography shouldn't be destiny.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: UCI is one of the premiere anesthesiology centers in the country with an excellent residency program for training future doctors and we are located in the UC Irvine Medical Center in Southern California.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I have the possibility.

lender.name: Homemade band
lender.loan_because: I know that this business that we have in our family will grow and be able to help us financially and give work to other people. We want to put up a barbeque grill/restaurant with live performing band where we can also play. We already have a quality sound system and band instruments that we can use but we are lacking in financial regarding putting up the grill that we are dreaming of. The band is compose of more than 10 person (a family band) with great talents. We hope that you could be able to help us fulfill our dreams and help not just one person but a dozen of people who could work with us. We chose this business because this is our talent, a talent that we should not waste. Your help will save us, our family and the lives of many. I loan because we are greatly lacking in financial means.
lender.occupational_info: This is a very interesting and enjoyable work because I worked together with my family, we work hard so that we could be able to survive and earn for our future, for a brighter future.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: murugiah
lender.loan_because: for starting a new repairing shop in new place
lender.occupational_info: with my brother and a friend

lender.name: Jeffri
lender.loan_because: This is a class project on globalization. Teams of students are learning about some positive effects of global economics
lender.occupational_info: I teach. I try to change perspectives and give individuals tools to make good choices.

lender.name: sheila
lender.loan_because: It appears like a wonderful program that a few of my close friends have been doing for some time and I wanted to join something positive.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I work with small businesses in North America and English speaking cities all over the world, who are looking to increase their presence on search engines like google. I help small business grow here, so I thought why not expand and help people in other countries that are not able to take advantage of the things I can offer.
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses find more customers. We target businesses that are looking to grow and want to make more money. We make it easy for potential customers to find them when they go on the internet to search for a service or product.

lender.name: Gregory

lender.occupational_info: business professor

lender.loan_because: I believe life is like a never ending flow of giving of ones self. Each of us have the ability to help each other in many way each day. With this program I offer the gift of hope.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother, a teacher of life. I have homeschooled my children for 8 years. I have the freedom of working for my self to earn a living. I also volunteer to support many groups to improve the committee I live in.

lender.loan_because: I hope that helping one person at a time can really make a difference on a larger scale.
lender.occupational_info: I help people, mostly Latinos, living with HIV/AIDS access care services, such as medications, insurance, and housing.

lender.loan_because: I belive in the individuals ability and right to make a difference his or her life. I loan because I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a master student, studying marketing at Norwegian School of Management and I work two different jobs besides my studies. I'm a sales person in a store selling mobile phones, and I do various jobs in a company called Serve The World.

lender.name: Samantha

lender.loan_because: We loan becasue we want to make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me mightily and I want to help those who too are simply wanting a chance to improve their lives. As a child I knew what it was like to struggle and have a desire to improve my circumstances and help support my mother and siblings.
lender.occupational_info: Now I am a teacher for the Army. But I am looking into getting more heavily involved in organizations that help women across the world.

lender.name: Caron
lender.occupation: Mom with a small farm and a big garden
lender.loan_because: My family lives a simple life, but we still have so much more than most people.
lender.occupational_info: I have many years of experience in agriculture and horticulture. I work part time so I can raise my daughter.

lender.name: Claire & Craig
lender.loan_because: We want to help...and we can!

lender.name: S.Y.
lender.loan_because: I want to help from my small corner of the world to alleviate poverty & suffering by impacting positive change through micro-financing. Lending money to various entrepeneurs helps them to initiate, develop & sustain their businesses and gives them a sense of empowerment, freedom, and fulfillment. It also helps them to pay for food and education costs for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I joyfully teach elementary school

lender.name: Lane
lender.loan_because: It helps me feel like I'm traveling more. I like learning about enterprising people and their geographies.
lender.occupational_info: I advocate for fitness in our political systems in the USA. I have been interested in personal health and fitness for a long time and now I'm trying to help our governments be healthier in the longer term to also help the fitness of our people.

lender.name: D.U.D.E.S.
lender.loan_because: So we can help people. Learn to be business owners With a giving heart.
lender.occupational_info: We love GOD. We are students learning to be business owners. We wish to be encouraged and to encourage others with a hand up!

lender.name: Suzanne Laite
lender.loan_because: I want to show my children how to make a difference in a life... change the world with one kind act at a time!

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I like to help others.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurs make the world go round.
lender.occupational_info: Touching lives, improving life.

lender.name: Guy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I help people make intelligent business decisions and understand complex technical problems

lender.name: R.T.
lender.loan_because: I have the means to do so.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: it's a small way to make a HUGE difference and helps people to be self- employed.

lender.name: Wander Women
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to help women to be self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of women (entrepreneurs, teachers, executives, artist, writers, some retired, some still working. We bike and walk every week and sometimes engage socially. We all feel very lucky to live here in Sonoma County, CA and want to extend a hand to other women in far away countries so they can benefit from a loan and increase their and their family's well being..

lender.name: Damien
lender.loan_because: I respect the desire, and need, for people to improve their, and their families', lives. My country has developed its infrastructure over many years and these loans are a way to help not just individuals but also their societies build an infrastructure that will work for them.
lender.occupational_info: I figure out how to make computers do what people want them to do. Sometimes that's even what they need them to do.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: CarpetCleaning.org is the world's largest carpet cleaning review site with over 33,000 cleaners.
lender.occupational_info: CarpetCleaning.org is the world's largest carpet cleaning review site with over 33,000 cleaners.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I believe in the mantra "Give a man a fish and he will eat for a day, teach a man to fish and he will eat for life" In lending, a person will be able to multiply it through their business.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.occupational_info: I help pepole find jobs.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to many countries, and have always been impressed with the people I have met. I believe micro loans can really change peoples' lives. If I can help people in some small way, I am fortunate to be able to do this.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I started our own service business 30 years ago. Working hard and working smart has paid off, and we are now successful.

lender.name: AnswerBlip.com
lender.loan_because: I want to help people get the things they need in their lives to be happy.
lender.occupational_info: I run a set of content and fun trivia websites that are supported by ads to raise money for non-profits and individuals.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because:
"who lends money to the poor without interest; who does not accept a bribe against the innocent. Whoever does these things will never be shaken." Psalm 15:5
"From everyone who has been given much, much will be demanded; and from the one who has been entrusted with much, much more will be asked." Luke 12:48
"If a man will not work, he shall not eat." 2 Thessalonians 3:10

lender.name: Brien
lender.loan_because: Whoever is kind to the poor lends to the Lord, and he will reward them for what they have done. - Proverbs 19:17
lender.occupational_info: I am a legislative aide in the United States Congress. I help prevent the waste and abuse of taxpayer money.

lender.name: Ram
lender.occupational_info: Would you like to find ways on how to do a better http://aaacreditguide.com

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I think people should take care of other people and I want to see you succeed!

lender.name: AirAmbulance
lender.loan_because: Accomodating all Medical and Special Needs
lender.occupational_info: Air Ambulance - Stat Air International Provides Air Ambulance, Med-evac's, and medical repatriation worldwide. 24/7 travel Assistance & Medical Escorts on private and commercial flights.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I want to help beat poverty.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: People should have the opportunity to invest in themselves

lender.name: Stephan
lender.loan_because: we are one world
lender.occupational_info: i am a singer and a guitar player

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: I want to support local arts & crafts worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist working with recycled materials and traditional mediums. Since this doesn't pay all the bills just yet, I also work retail.
